column5: Center point is conveniently located near: the Alamo, San Antonio River Walk; Schlitterbahn Waterpark; John Newcombe Tennis Ranch; historic Fredericksburg for local wines and the National Museum of the Pacific War; Camp Verde historic post office and general store; Coming King Sculpture prayer garden.   Nightlife: Live music at Gruene Hall, the oldest dance hall in Texas; Live music and dining at John T. Floore Country Store in Helotes, Tx.  One hour to San Antonio International Airport.
